<< diag Constructors functions eye >>

eps

Creates an epsilon (machine precision)

Syntax

eps
eps
eps(n)
eps(n, m)
eps('double')
eps('single')

Input argument

n

a variable: n-by-n matrix

m

a variable: n-by-m matrix

Description

eps returns the machine precision 2^(-52) for double and 2^(-23) for single.

eps(Inf), eps(-Inf) and eps(NaN) return NaN.

Examples

eps


eps('double')


eps('single')

See also

double, single.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
